title.rendered: January 2023 Market Update with John Zaller

content.rendered: On this segment of MAI’s Market Update, John Zaller, CIO of MAI Capital, reviews the challenging performance environment in 2022 and discusses the outlook for 2023 and beyond.

excerpt.rendered: On this segment of MAI’s Market Update, John Zaller, CIO of MAI Capital, reviews the challenging performance environment in 2022 and discusses the outlook for 2023 and beyond.
